mapper.select: SELECT cart_idx,wc.member_id,wl.lecture_idx,cart_reg_date, lecture_image,lecture_title,lecture_price,lecture_sale_price,lecture_start_date,lecture_end_date FROM woo_cart as wc INNER JOIN woo_lecture as wl ON wc.lecture_idx = wl.lecture_idx WHERE cart_status=#{cart_status} AND wc.member_id = #{member_id}
